type.name: T:Elysium.Parameters.MenuBase
type.summary: Represents a class that manages the settings of the style of the menu.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.MenuBase.SubmenuBackground
property.summary: Gets or sets the color of the background of the submenu.
property.value: The color of the background of the submenu. Default value â€” null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.MenuBase.GetSubmenuBackground(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: The size of the background of the submenu.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.MenuBase.SetSubmenuBackground(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase,System.Windows.Media.Brush)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
The color of the background of the submenu.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.MenuBase.SubmenuBorderBrush
property.summary: Gets or sets the color of the border of the submenu.
property.value: The color of the border of the submenu. Default value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.MenuBase.GetSubmenuBorderBrush(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: The size of the border of the submenu.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.MenuBase.SetSubmenuBorderBrush(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase,System.Windows.Media.Brush)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
The color of the border of the submenu.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.

property.name: P:Elysium.Parameters.MenuBase.SubmenuBorderThickness
property.summary: Gets or sets the size of the border thickness of the submenu.
property.value: The size of the border thickness of the submenu. Default value = (0,0,0,0).

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.MenuBase.GetSubmenuBorderThickness(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase)
method.summary: Returns the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being got.
method.returns: The size of the border of the submenu.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.
method.ensures: The being returned value is positive.

method.name: M:Elysium.Parameters.MenuBase.SetSubmenuBorderThickness(System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.MenuBase,System.Windows.Thickness)
method.summary: Sets the value of the dependency property for the specified control.
method.param: The control, for which the value of the property is being set.
The color of the border of the submenu.
method.exception: The parameter has a value = null.
